location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Philip Durham Henderson, Government of India, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly, Officiating Agent to the Governor General for Rajpootana [Rﾄ）asthﾄ］]

mods.abstract: Letter informing Pelly that the Rajpootana [Rﾄ）asthﾄ］] Chief's will be permitted to leave Agra as soon as the Durbar is over and that he should hint to them that the earlier they depart the better.
